books: books are a great source of news, as they are often updated regularly with current events and can be found in most libraries.
radio: radio is a great alternative to television for news, as it is often live and can be accessed on most devices.
social media: social media platforms like Twitter and Facebook are great sources of news, as they often provide real-time updates on current events.
podcasts: podcasts are a great source of news, as they often provide in-depth analysis and discussion of current events.
newspapers: newspapers are a great source of news, as they often provide detailed coverage of current events and can be found in most grocery stores and newsstands.
